Quick search

GUI for Lake/Jemian desmearing¶

Lake desmearing GUI using Enthought’s Chaco and Traits packages.

class gui.desmearing_gui.Gui[source]¶

Provide interactive access to all the parameters used in desmearing

This is a main GUI. It uses Traits. Call it with code like this:

gui = Gui()
gui.configure_traits(filename=paramfile)
my_callback(q, I, dI, C, S, iteration, ChiSqr, info, extrap)[source]¶

this function is called after every desmearing iteration from lake.desmear.Desmear()

Parameters:
  • q (array) – array (list)
  • I (array) – array (list) of SAS data I(q) +/- dI(q)
  • dI (array) – array (list)
  • S (array) – array (list) of smeared intensity
  • C (array) – array (list) of corrected intensity
  • iteration (int) – iteration number
  • ChiSqr (float) – Chi-Squared value
  • info (dict) – dictionary of input parameters
  • extrap (obj) – extrapolation function structure
Returns:

should desmearing stop?
Return type:

bool
